a.h1: Clay County USD 379 District of Opportunity: Expect Success

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p:
PreK through 2nd grade parents....looking for something for your child to do? We have something for everybody! Check us out!
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1B83GYEN8CMNOu0EbCFCHMPlHihey4zfp8-pwk4Q5FGw/edit
Check out week three in USD 379! The week ended with the lights in our community shining for our seniors. Share your story with us. #usd379 #bettertogether #seniors2020

Check this out! Tune into Learning Across Kansas! Kansas teachers sharing learning on local PBS channel!
https://5il.co/f8h3

We want to encourage ALL families to come and grab breakfast/lunch from our food distribution locations, no matter your income! It's not costing the district extra money as we receive full reimbursement for each meal served. The more we serve the better!

p.a: Event: Clay Center Youth Track Meet
